img.alt: Alliance BOE Approves Plan for Consolidation

h3.a: Alliance BOE Approves Plan for Consolidation

div.p: The Alliance Board of Education unanimously approved the plan to consolidate the elementary buildings and move the Alliance Digital Academy and Success Academy to Parkway. The plan was introduced...

img.alt: Remote Learning to Continue for Remainder of School Year

h3.a: Remote Learning to Continue for Remainder of School Year

div.p: Dear Aviators, During today’s press conference, Governor DeWine announced schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. While this is sad news, we have been planning for this...
